Hyperliquid just hit its highest daily revenue since November, fueled by the recent HIP-3 proposal and a surge in trading. 

Daily earnings surged to $296,000, eclipsing every day of the new year so far.

What sparked this rally? 
2/ Trading volume jumped to $1.15 billion, marking a two-month high.

This spike came after HIP-3, which introduced single-sided liquidity and new incentives for market makers.

The exchange's OEV rebate also played a role in attracting fresh activity.
3/ Rising daily revenue signals renewed confidence among users and liquidity providers.

Increased market maker incentives may lead to tighter spreads, deeper books, and better price discovery.

Sustained activity could influence competitors‚Äô incentive strategies.
4/ Hyperliquid‚Äôs latest revenue jump sets a new bar for decentralized exchanges, fueled by HIP-3 and market maker incentives.

As engagement builds, rival platforms may need to reassess how they compete for both users and liquidity.

$HYPE


1H - From a market auction theory standpoint, this is still a successful auction, and we are still retesting from above a broken consolidation phase.


Structure remains intact, so it makes sense to keep a bullish bias as long as we hold above VaH, and consequently build a long interest.
#Macro Insights# #HYPE

Kraken Lists Hyperliquid's $HYPE token

The American exchange Kraken has officially added Hyperliquid‚Äôs HYPE token to its spot trading offering. The pairs HYPE/USD and HYPE/EUR have been available since January 28, 2026, at 15:00 UTC, according to the announcement published on the platform‚Äôs official X account. This listing comes as the token shows a spectacular increase of more than 50% over one week, driven by the explosion in trading volumes on the protocol‚Äôs commodity markets.
More infos : https://dub.sh/5FLN8l0

$HYPE  reflects a broader truth about crypto markets: attention is a form of liquidity. As long as a token remains part of active conversation, it attracts participation. The challenge is sustaining that participation once momentum slows and speculation becomes more selective.  STONfi plays a neutral but critical role in this process by remaining useful regardless of sentiment. As a DeFi execution layer within TON, it supports capital movement during both expansion and contraction phases. This consistency allows users to engage with tokens like $HYPE  without being fully dependent on hype cycles themselves.  In the long run, narratives bring users in - infrastructure determines whether they stay.  #HYPE  #DeFi  #TON  #Blockchain  #Crypto

What makes $HYPE  interesting is not just volatility, but how quickly sentiment around it can rotate. Tokens built on attention often experience compressed market cycles, where accumulation, distribution, and exhaustion happen faster than expected. This rewards adaptability over long-term rigidity.  STONfi complements this dynamic by offering a DeFi environment on TON designed for frequent interaction and predictable execution. When users can reposition efficiently, they are better equipped to manage risk in fast-moving markets. Infrastructure doesn‚Äôt remove uncertainty, but it reduces friction when reacting to it.  In ecosystems where narratives dominate, the ability to act calmly and efficiently becomes a competitive advantage.  #HYPE  #DeFi  #TON  #CryptoMarkets  #Web3

$HYPE  is a token that lives almost entirely at the intersection of narrative and market psychology. Its price action is often driven less by fundamentals and more by attention cycles, momentum, and collective positioning. This makes $HYPE  highly reactive - when sentiment turns, moves tend to be fast in both directions.  In this type of environment, execution matters more than conviction. Participants don‚Äôt just speculate on where the narrative is going; they manage exposure as conditions change. Within the TON ecosystem, STONfi functions as an execution layer that supports this behavior, enabling users to interact on-chain without relying on centralized intermediaries. It doesn‚Äôt amplify hype - it provides the tools to navigate it.  As markets mature, even narrative-driven tokens like $HYPE  depend on reliable infrastructure to remain tradable across cycles.  #HYPE  #STONfi  #DeFi  #Crypto  #MarketNarratives

It only cared about margin.

I usually skip New Year promos, but this one caught my attention the moment I saw the $7M prize pool. What makes it stand out is the variety mystery boxes, trading leaderboards, referrals, even simple sharing rewards. You‚Äôre not boxed into just one way to take part.


I like setups where I can move at my own pace and still have a real shot at something worthwhile. It feels less like a quick promo and more like a proper trading season kickoff, especially with high-momentum narratives like $HYPE in the mix.


It runs until early February, so there‚Äôs still time to plan and play it smart.

üöÄ GT Protocol Weekly Recap 

This week was all about forward-looking updates. We focused on refining the backtesting system, joining meaningful industry conversations, and continuing our AI content flow.

üõ† GT AI Backtest ‚Äî Ongoing Evolution
We‚Äôre actively evolving the backtest to make it sharper, cleaner, and more intelligent. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs in progress and coming next:

‚öôÔ∏è LLM Upgrade: Gemini is replacing DeepSeek for strategy generation, bringing stronger reasoning and more stable outputs. Currently in development and coming in the next weeks.
‚öôÔ∏è Market Expansion: new trading pairs from Hyperliquid are being added to extend coverage. In development and coming in the next weeks.
‚öôÔ∏è Multi-Asset Support: Gold and Silver are joining the backtest universe, opening access beyond crypto. In development and coming in the next weeks.
‚öôÔ∏è Top Pair Signals: a Top 3 Pairs block is being added at the top of the flow for faster idea discovery. In development and coming in the next weeks.
‚öôÔ∏è Refined Asset List: the coin universe has been streamlined to improve signal quality and backtest reliability.
‚öôÔ∏è Deep Optimization UX: optimization methods were visually refined to make advanced logic easier to read and understand.

üéâ GT AI Backtest Bug Bounty Completed
We‚Äôve wrapped up the GT AI Backtest Bug Bounty. Hundreds of reports came in from the community, and your attention to detail helped us significantly improve the backtest in a very short time. Huge thanks to everyone who participated.

üéô Twitter Space with Dormint
GT Protocol joined Dormint‚Äôs Twitter Space ‚ÄúDeAI as a Baseline for Building‚Äù, discussing why AI is becoming core infrastructure and how decentralized AI is shaping what builders create next.

üì∞ AI Digest ‚Äî New Edition Live
A new issue of our AI Digest is now available on Medium covering the latest developments across AI, tech, and emerging risks.
New editions drop every Friday.

More updates ahead
